SELECT dates.orderDay, NVL(COUNT(M.CREATE_DATE), 0) AS countMember FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDay FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) dates LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON TO_CHAR(M.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = dates.orderDay GROUP BY dates.orderDay ORDER BY dates.orderDay

SELECT dates.orderDay, NVL(COUNT(P.CREATE_DATE), 0) AS countBoard FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDay FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) dates LEFT JOIN POST P ON TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = dates.orderDay GROUP BY dates.orderDay ORDER BY dates.orderDay

SELECT dates.orderDay, NVL(COUNT(C.CREATE_DATE), 0) AS countComment FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDay FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) dates LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON TO_CHAR(C.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = dates.orderDay GROUP BY dates.orderDay ORDER BY dates.orderDay

SELECT dates.orderDay, NVL(COUNT(NC.CREATE_DATE), 0) AS countComment FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDay FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) dates LEFT JOIN NESTED_COMMENT NC ON TO_CHAR(NC.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = dates.orderDay GROUP BY dates.orderDay ORDER BY dates.orderDay

SELECT * FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN USER_GRADE UG ON UG.GRADE_NO = M.GRADE_NO LEFT JOIN POINT P ON M.USER_NO = P.USER_NO WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO, COMMENT_NO, P.TITLE, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, NULL AS NESTED_COMMENT_NO FROM "COMMENT" C LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN BIG_CATEGORY BC ON BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO = SC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo} UNION SELECT B.BOARD_NO, NC.COMMENT_NO, P.TITLE, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, NESTED_COMMENT_NO FROM NESTED_COMMENT NC LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON C.COMMENT_NO = NC.COMMENT_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN BIG_CATEGORY BC ON BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO = SC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO WHERE NC.USER_NO = #{userNo} ) RESULT

SELECT P.TITLE, BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, B.BOARD_NO, P.CREATE_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO = P.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN BIG_CATEGORY BC ON SC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO = BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo}
AND TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_NO) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND P.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY
B.BOARD_NO DESC
BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, P.CREATE_DATE DESC
SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, P.CREATE_DATE DESC
P.TITLE, P.CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, B.BOARD_NO FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO = P.POST_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NO, TITLE, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, BIG_CATEGORY_NAME FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO, COMMENT_NO, P.TITLE, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, NULL AS NESTED_COMMENT_NO FROM "COMMENT" C LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN BIG_CATEGORY BC ON BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO = SC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo}
AND TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_NO) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND C.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
UNION SELECT B.BOARD_NO, NC.COMMENT_NO, P.TITLE, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, NESTED_COMMENT_NO FROM NESTED_COMMENT NC LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON C.COMMENT_NO = NC.COMMENT_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN BIG_CATEGORY BC ON BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO = SC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO WHERE NC.USER_NO = #{userNo}
AND B.BOARD_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND CN.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
) RESULT ORDER BY
BOARD_NO DESC
BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_NO DESC
SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_NO DESC
TITLE

SELECT CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, BOARD_NO FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO, C.CONTENT, C.CREATE_DATE FROM "COMMENT" C LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} UNION ALL SELECT B.BOARD_NO, NC.CONTENT, NC.CREATE_DATE FROM NESTED_COMMENT NC LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON C.COMMENT_NO = NC.COMMENT_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO WHERE NC.USER_NO = #{userNo} and B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ) RESULT ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, P.TITLE, COUNT(H.HITS_NO) AS hit, P.CREATE_DATE, P.MODIFY_DATE, B.STATUS FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN HITS H ON B.BOARD_NO = H.BOARD_NO
WHERE TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_NO) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE P.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
GROUP BY B.BOARD_NO, SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, P.TITLE, P.CREATE_DATE, P.MODIFY_DATE, B.STATUS ORDER BY
B.BOARD_NO
SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME
P.TITLE
hit

SELECT COMMENT_NO, NESTED_COMMENT_NO, BOARD_NO, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM (SELECT C.COMMENT_NO, B.BOARD_NO, SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, P.TITLE, C.CONTENT, C.CREATE_DATE, C.MODIFY_DATE, C.STATUS, NULL AS NESTED_COMMENT_NO FROM "COMMENT" C LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO
WHERE TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_NO) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE C.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
UNION SELECT C.COMMENT_NO, B.BOARD_NO, SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, P.TITLE, NC.CONTENT, NC.CREATE_DATE, NC.MODIFY_DATE, NC.STATUS, NC.NESTED_COMMENT_NO FROM NESTED_COMMENT NC LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON NC.COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO
WHERE TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_NO) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE NC.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
) ORDER BY
BOARD_NO
SUB_CATEGORY_NAME
TITLE

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT C.COMMENT_NO) AS a FROM "COMMENT" C LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO = P.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO
WHERE TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_NO) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE C.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
) + (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT NC.NESTED_COMMENT_NO) AS b FROM NESTED_COMMENT NC LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON NC.COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO = P.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO
WHERE TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_NO) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE C.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
) AS total_count FROM DUAL

SELECT T.TRASH_NO, TBC.BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, TSC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, TP.TRASH_TITLE, TP.CREATE_DATE, TP.MODIFY_DATE, COUNT(HITS_NO) AS hit FROM TRASH T LEFT JOIN TRASH_SUB_CATEGORY TSC ON T.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = TSC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN TRASH_BIG_CATEGORY TBC ON TSC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO = TBC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN TRASH_POST TP ON T.TRASH_POST_NO = TP.TRASH_POST_NO LEFT JOIN TRASH_HITS TH ON T.TRASH_NO = T.TRASH_NO
WHERE TO_CHAR(T.TRASH_NO) LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE TSC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE TP.TRASH_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
GROUP BY T.TRASH_NO, TBC.BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, TSC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, TP.TRASH_TITLE, TP.CREATE_DATE, TP.MODIFY_DATE
ORDER BY T.TRASH_NO, TP.CREATE_DATE
ORDER BY TSC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, TP.CREATE_DATE
ORDER BY TP.TRASH_TITLE, TP.CREATE_DATE
ORDER BY hit, TP.CREATE_DATE

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRASH T LEFT JOIN TRASH_SUB_CATEGORY TSC ON T.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = TSC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN TRASH_POST TP ON T.TRASH_POST_NO = TP.TRASH_POST_NO

WHERE TP.TRASH_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
